name: Merge Tanks: Idle Tap Clicker
description:
Tap on the start line and let your tanks make you the richest man in the world. There are no place for planes as they are idle. Rush your tanks in this clicker simulator and earn money for every tank in your army, become the richest owner of tanks. Each time tank completes a lap he will bring you some money. Spend money to buy new tanks and earn even more money. Tap to merge your tanks into more modern one. Find out what mines are hiding in our new clicker simulator. Let your tanks bring you all money from mine, merge them and earn billions. Idle planes will not bring you that much, so click to put your tanks into mine and merge them. Become the richest man in the world in our new clicker simulator: Tank Merge: Idle Tap Clicker.

In this clicker simulator, you have one simple target: Become the richest man in the world. In the beginning, you have a simple tank. Tap on the line to put your tank into a mine to earn some money. Each time your tanks complete the lap in mine you will earn money. Spend your money to buy new, tanks that are more powerful. You can merge your tanks to create new upgraded tank, which will bring you more money each lap. There are no place for idle planes, so invade the mine with your tanks and let them make you the richest tank owner ever. Sometimes we will drop you a box with tanks. Tap on the line and put those tanks into the mine to increase your income. Share this game with your friends and find out who will become rich faster. Show everyone that one your tap will bring you billions. Become the richest tank owner in our clicker simulator.

Tank Merge: Idle Tap Clicker is a free to play clicker simulator. Forget about idle planes in our simulator, there is no place for them in the mine. Become the richest man in our game. So merge your tanks and tap to put them into the mine. Put so many tanks, that they will bring you billions in a second. Show everyone that you are the richest tank owner here. Call your friends and play together. Find out whose tanks will bring more money. How many tanks can you put inside the mine? Being rich is not difficult, so forget about idle planes, merge your tanks and tap to put them inside the mine in our new idle clicker simulator.
